{{Infobox American State Political Party | party_name = Connecticut Republican Party | party_articletitle = Republican Party (United States) | party_logo = | website = [http://www.ctgop.org www.ctgop.org] | headquarters = 321 Ellis Street, Suite 501

Minority Leader | houseleader= [[Lawrence F. Cafero]]
Minority Leader | ideology = [[Center-right]]
[[Conservatism in the United States|Conservatism]]
[[Economic liberalism]] | UHseats = {{Infobox political party/seats|14|36|hex=red}} | LHseats = {{Infobox political party/seats|52|151|hex=red}} | national = [[Republican Party (United States)|Republican Party]] | footnotes = }} The '''Connecticut Republican Party''' is the [[Connecticut]] affiliate of the U.S. [[Republican Party (United States)|Republican Party]]. Jerry Labriola Jr., a [[Wallingford, Connecticut|Wallingford]] attorney and 2010 [[United States House of Representatives elections in Connecticut, 2010#District 3|candidate for Congress]], is the party chairman, elected on June 28, 2011.{{Cite news|url=http://www.courant.com/community/wallingford/hc-gop-picks-leader-0629-20110628,0,1012773.story |title=State GOP Chooses Labriola As Party Chairman |last=Altimari |first=Daniela |newspaper=[[Hartford Courant]] |publisher= |date=June 28, 2011 |accessdate=June 29, 2011}} Prior to his election as chairman, Labriola served as the party's treasurer. ==Elected officials== ===Members of Congress=== *None ===Statewide offices=== *None ===[[Connecticut General Assembly|Legislative]]=== *Senate minority leader: [[John P. McKinney]] *House minority leader: [[Lawrence F. Cafero]] ==Republican National Committee members== *Committeeman: John H. Frey *Committeewoman: Patricia Longo ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.ctgop.org/ Connecticut Republican Party] *[http://ctgop.blogspot.com/ The Everyday Republican] official blog of the Connecticut Republican Party {{State Republican Parties in the US}} {{ConnecticutPoliticalParties}} [[Category:Political parties in Connecticut|Republican]] [[Category:Republican Party (United States) by state|Connecticut]]
